name: Sola
headline: Copilot for Robotic Process Automation
description:
Sola is copilot for workflow automation. 

We help automation-minded teams build robust robotic agents to handle tedious tasks via LLMs and computer vision, smoothly integrated into their standard workflow. 

Our tooling makes it easy for companies to automate data entry/scraping in manual filing and processing flows. Go from a screen recording to a bot in any desktop or browser workflow; develop logic and watch logic self-develop in the face of new events!
generated_description:
**Sola: Your Copilot in Robotic Process Automation**

Founded in 2023 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, Sola is revolutionizing how businesses automate repetitive tasks. Based in Jersey City, NJ, with a small but mighty team of five, Sola's mission is simple yet powerful: to act as a copilot for robotic process automation (RPA). 

The idea is that automation-minded teams can leverage Sola's innovative tools to build robust robotic agents that handle tedious tasks—think data entry, scraping, and filing—integrated seamlessly into their existing workflows. No heavy lifting is required: you can literally go from a screen recording to a functional bot in a matter of minutes.

### How It Works
Sola utilizes advanced technologies, including large language models and computer vision, to empower teams to automate their workflow without the usual headaches. Their platform supports a variety of industries—legal, financial, insurance, and healthcare—allowing "citizen developers" to easily harness automation within their teams. 

What’s particularly interesting about Sola is its ability to adapt. The bots can learn and evolve in response to new events, making them increasingly valuable over time. The interface is designed to be user-friendly, allowing anyone—regardless of technical expertise—to create bots that can take over those repetitive, mind-numbing tasks. 

### Real-World Impact
Sola isn't just theory; it's already making waves with various clients. They include a rapidly scaling neobank that needs to scrape critical data from financial websites and a unicorn startup that’s deploying bots for legal workflows across states. These implementations showcase Sola's commitment to not just automation, but real business growth.

In a landscape where efficiency is paramount, Sola positions itself as not just a tool, but a crucial partner for companies looking to streamline operations and enhance productivity.

So, if you're tired of drowning in paperwork and manual processes, it might be worth checking out what Sola has to offer. After all, the future of work is about smart automation that works alongside you, not against you. 

Curious to see it in action? [Book a demo](https://www.sola-solutions.com/contact) with Sola today! 

For more details, visit their website: [Sola Solutions](https://www.sola-solutions.com).
